name: Insomnia & Sleep Issues
description: Difficulty falling asleep, staying asleep, or waking too early. Can be occasional or chronic, often related to stress, anxiety, or poor sleep habits.
approaches: Sedative herbs taken 30-60 minutes before bed
Nervine teas to wind down in evening
whenToSeek: If insomnia persists for more than a few weeks, if accompanied by daytime impairment, or if you suspect sleep apnea
